## useForm ⇒ <code>\*</code>
Convenience hook to display captions for the audio player
for controlling captions use the useCaptions hook.

**Kind**: global constant  
**Returns**: <code>\*</code> - `{ formData, errors, handleChange, handleSubmit }`  
**See**: [Reusing Logic with Custom Hooks](https://react.dev/learn/reusing-logic-with-custom-hooks)  
**Todo**

- [ ] should the on change be debounced?
- [ ] Do we need to handle edge case when `initialFormData` is empty object? (see in code comment)
- [ ] Follow up - `initialFormData` Do we need to also do some validation on initial data? eg that is matches schema? (eg via `validate` function?)
- [ ] how to deal with situation when save btn is outside of form?


| Param | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| param | <code>object</code> |  | `{initialFormData, schema, onSubmitCallback, onChangeCallback}` |
| [options.initialFormData] | <code>object</code> | <code>{}</code> | Optional data to initialize the form with. Eg if you are editing/updating existing data. |
| options.schema | <code>object</code> |  | The schema for the form |
| [options.onSubmitCallback] | <code>function</code> |  | Optional callback for when the form is save/submit |
| [options.onChangeCallback] | <code>function</code> |  | Optional callback for then the form is saved |

**Example** *(&#x60;useForm&#x60; import)*  
```js
import { useForm } from "./useForm/index.js";
```
**Example** *(useForm example )*  
```js
const { formData, errors, handleChange, handleSubmit } = useForm(({initialFormData, schema, onSubmitCallback, onChangeCallback})
```

## createInitialFormData(options) ⇒ <code>Object</code>
Creates an initial form data object with default values from a schema.

**Kind**: global function  
**Returns**: <code>Object</code> - The initial form data object with default values.  

| Param | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| options | <code>Object</code> |  | The options object. |
| options.schema | <code>Object</code> |  | The schema object. |
| [options.formData] | <code>Object</code> | <code>{}</code> | The existing form data object (optional). |
